meanings.definition: A genus of flowering plants in the heath family.
meanings.sent1: The ericas in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I learned about ericas in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The ericas in the garden seemed to be gossiping with the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: The ericas stood out like colorful jewels in the green sea of leaves.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the ericas danced in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the name Erica.
meanings.sent1: We invited the Ericas to our party.
meanings.sent2: The Ericas were all friends since childhood.
meanings.sent3: The Ericas decided to start a book club together.
meanings.sent4: Among the group, the Ericas shone like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the Ericas filled the room with joy.
